editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: City of Detroit III Costing $1,500,000. operating between Detroit and Buffalo - - Length 500 feet, 100 feet wide, 600 Staterooms, 50 Parlors, private verandas, telephones in eveyr room.

Hello you cute little doll. how in the world is old Asheville Lovely tho of course. wish I could have been there sunday night with you at the movies ha. well how are you and John getting along haha. ans. Just Elarence it is fine and cool here
